title: AZIR: tips and tricks # 1 - Drifting

embed.description: hey guys, swifty here today i will be showing you a video of tips and tricks it is a new series i will be doing they will all be on different champions this one is on azir's drifting. Btw this is NOT my real voice i used a text to voice website.

body: This is my youtube video which shows how to drift on azir this trick can be very helpful for escaping, going in and making plays
